admission_requirements.program_name: Master of Science in Computer Science

eligibility_criteria.degree: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
eligibility_criteria.gpa: Minimum GPA of 3.0 on a 4.0 scale
prerequisites: Proficiency in at least one programming language (e.g., Python, Java, C++)
Knowledge of data structures and algorithms

required_documents: Official transcripts from all previous institutions

admission_requirements.program_name: Bachelor of Arts in English Literature

eligibility_criteria.academic_performance: Minimum of B average in high school
eligibility_criteria.standardized_tests: SAT or ACT scores (specific minimums may apply)

required_documents: Two letters of recommendation from teachers
